parameters.name: Authentication
parameters.description:
Token tokenValue
or
Basic loginName:password
or
Leave blank if using Client Certificate Authentication

400.description:
Required Field(s) Missing: [fieldName]

Invalid value of field(s): [fieldName]

403.description:
Invalid permissions for the requested operation.

Normal Administrator cannot create, modify or delete master Administrator.

Normal - Normal Administrator only has write access permission on organization [orgName].

Organization Administrator [loginName] has Read Privileges to Organization [orgName] and cannot assign Write Privileges to Organization [orgName]

404.description:
Organization <orgName> was not found.

The contact was not found.

The location was not found.

500.description:
Administrator <loginName> already exists.

Error when assigning organization with name [orgName] for administrator [loginName].

parameters.name: Authentication
parameters.description:
Token tokenValue
or
Basic loginName:password
or
Leave blank if using Client Certificate Authentication

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description:
.json for a response in JSON format.
.xml for a response in XML format.

put.description:
Modify an administrator account.
*Note:* Administrator loginName must exist; it cannot be modified via REST. Password can only be modified using admin/changePassword REST API. The adminType cannot be modified via REST API.

parameters.name: Authentication
parameters.description:
Token tokenValue
or
Basic loginName:password
or
Leave blank if using Client Certificate Authentication

400.description:
Required Field(s) Missing: [fieldName]

Invalid value of field(s): [fieldName]

403.description:
Invalid permissions for the requested operation.

Normal Administrator cannot create, modify or delete master Administrator.

Normal Administrator <loginName> did not create Administrator <loginName> and will not have modify/delete/clone permissions.

Normal - Normal Administrator only has write access permission on organization [orgName].

404.description:
Administrator <loginName> was not found.

Organization <orgName> was not found.

The contact was not found.

The location was not found.

500.description: Error when assigning organization with name [orgName] for administrator [loginName].

put.summary: Change password for an administrator account.
put.description: Change password for an administrator account.

parameters.name: Authentication
parameters.description:
Token tokenValue
or
Basic loginName:password
or
Leave blank if using Client Certificate Authentication

500.description:
Normal Administrator <loginName> cannot create, modify or delete Master Administrator <loginName>.

Normal Administrator <loginName> did not create Administrator <loginName> and will not have modify/delete/clone permissions.

The new password does not match the confirm password.

The authentication type of admin [loginName] is not password type.

parameters.description:

Leave blank if using Client Certificate Authentication

403.description: Invalid permissions for the requested operation.

500.description:
Normal Administrator <loginName> did not create Administrator <loginName> and will not have modify/delete/clone permissions.

Normal Administrator [loginName] cannot create, modify or delete Master Administrator [loginName].

get.description: Search administrator by login name, admin type or admin status. It just return basic information of admin such as loginName, adminType, authenticationType and assignedOrganizations if it's Normal Administrator.

parameters.name: Authentication
parameters.description:
Token tokenValue
or
Basic loginName:password
or
Leave blank if using Client Certificate Authentication

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description:
.json for a response in JSON format.
.xml for a response in XML format.

parameters.name: loginName
parameters.description:
Login name of the administrator for which you are searching.
You can use an asterisk (*) as a wildcard character to 
return a range of results.

get.description: Use this URL to download Administrators report file. When using cURL with this API specify "-o fileName.extension" to download file contents. Internet Explorer browser users: to download the report please right click the “Download file” link and select “Save as” then input the desired file name with the correct extension. Example: qipman-AdministratorsReport-20190328_103238_523_0700.html or qipman-AdministratorsReport-20190328_103238_523_0700.pdf

parameters.name: adminNames
parameters.description: Administrator Names (Empty this field to report for all administrators). To add multiple administrators, enter a comma separated list

403.description: Invalid permissions for the requested operation.

authenticationType.description:
Authentication Type. One of following values: 

'Password',</br>'Certificate',</br>'SAML Managed',</br>'SAML Authenticated'

adminStatus.description:
Admin Status. One of following values: 

'Disabled',</br>'Enabled'

assignedOrganizations.description: The Organizations to be assigned with Normal Administrator

globalPrivileges.description: The Global Privileges to be created with Administrator

organizationPrivilegesDefault.description: The Default Organization Privileges to be created with Normal Administrator

organizationPrivileges.privilegeName: Allow Dynamic MDHCP Update Without DHCP Server Permission

subPrivileges.privilegeName: Write New Infrastructure to Managed List

organizationPrivilegesDefault.privilegeName: Allow Dynamic MDHCP Update Without DHCP Server Permission
